## Proposed Solution (if known)
_If the issue is one that can be fixed easily by changing HTML, CSS, or JavaScript markup, include the snippet in the issue description. If it is a longer fix or you do not have a ready solution, remove this section._

```html
<button
  aria-label="Open Level of Coverage Tool"
  class="adc-c-button adc-c-button-large"
  type="button"
>
  Level of Coverage
</button>
```
